org.springframework.cache.interceptor

接口 CacheOperationInvoker

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CacheOperationInvoker
    Abstract the invocation of a cache operation.

    Does not provide a way to transmit checked exceptions but provide a special exception that should be used to wrap any exception that was thrown by the underlying invocation. Callers are expected to handle this issue type specifically.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.1

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  CacheOperationInvoker.ThrowableWrapper
      Wrap any exception thrown while invoking invoke().

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object invoke()
      Invoke the cache operation defined by this instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • invoke

        Object invoke()
       throws CacheOperationInvoker.ThrowableWrapper
        Invoke the cache operation defined by this instance. Wraps any exception that is thrown during the invocation in a CacheOperationInvoker.ThrowableWrapper.
        返回:
        the result of the operation
        抛出:
        CacheOperationInvoker.ThrowableWrapper - if an error occurred while invoking the operation
